author: jdcasey
msg: Fixing abstract scripted mojo descriptor extractor to properly construct script resource directories. Also, cleaned up the usage integration test. Ant support works now, but we need to decide what version this should be released under. It will involve re-releasing the plugin-plugin, to take advantage of the new maven-plugin-tools-api, I think.

author: jdcasey
msg: Fixed dependency-exclusion propagation to the release-pom.xml, and changed the pom-file handling for release:perform to allow non-standard POM filenames, and to prompt in the case where the POM being used is the release-pom.xml.

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed the test of binary attributes
